title: Parkinson’s Disease Tremor and Motion Analysis
description: Real‑time automated detection of Parkinson’s tremors and motion patterns using synchronized camera feeds.

title: Machine Learning‑Based Surgical Hand Assessment
description: Automated evaluation of surgical hand‑washing technique through machine‑learning analysis of annotated video data.

title: Venezuelan Election Tally Sheet Processor
description: Web‑based OCR pipeline to digitize and validate Venezuelan election tally sheets with high accuracy.

title: Customized Elementary CPU Design
description: Instruction‑level CPU architecture implemented in VHDL on an FPGA for a digital logic course.
